SELECT c.class_code, c.class_name, c.class_thumnail, c.class_hashtag, c.class_price, c2.code_value AS big_category, c3.code_value AS small_category, m.member_nickname, m.member_img FROM ( SELECT p.class_code, COUNT(*) AS count FROM pay p JOIN class c ON p.class_code = c.class_code WHERE c.class_active = 'N' AND c.class_regist_status = '2' GROUP BY p.class_code ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10 ) AS top_classes JOIN class c ON c.class_code = top_classes.class_code JOIN common2 c2 ON c.class_big_category = c2.common2_code AND c2.common1_code = 'CLC' JOIN common3 c3 ON c.class_small_category = c3.common3_code AND c3.common2_code = c2.common2_code AND c3.common1_code = 'CLC' JOIN MEMBER m ON c.member_code = m.member_code;

SELECT c.class_code, c2.code_value AS local_name FROM ( SELECT p.class_code, COUNT(*) AS count FROM pay p JOIN class c ON p.class_code = c.class_code WHERE c.class_active = 'N' AND c.class_regist_status = '2' GROUP BY p.class_code ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10 ) AS top_classes JOIN class c ON c.class_code = top_classes.class_code JOIN common2 c2 ON c.common2_code = c2.common2_code AND c2.common1_code = 'LC';
